information: The company HEINRICH KLEIN DACHDECKER- UND BAUKLEMPNERBETRIEB GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1980, which operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industry. It also operates in the Gas and oil - exploitation, Water - production and distribution, Ceilings, and Structural work industries. It is based in Köln, Germany.
